name: proctor
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to watch people taking an exam in order to check that they do not cheat: Miss Jekyll will be proctoring today. He proctored our final.

a person whose job is to watch people taking an exam in order to check that they do not cheat: If you need more paper, please ask the proctor. Students must be supervised by one proctor for every 25 test takers.
More examplesFewer examplesAny test should be administered by a proctor at a testing centre. Most cheating accusations come from students or exam proctors.The proctors are expected to be circulating, to be looking at what students are doing.
